PROC: g g > ha > l- l+ tp tp~ [noborn=QCD] ZSS^2==2 TTHA^2==2
ggF_TRI.NAME: gg_ztt_%s_ggF_tri
PROC_Z: g g > ha > z tp tp~ [noborn=QCD] ZSS^2==2 TTHA^2==2

PROC: g g > ha > l- l+ tp tp~ [noborn=QCD] ZFF^2==2 ZZHH<=0 TTHA^2==2
ggF_BOX.NAME: gg_ztt_%s_ggF_box
PROC_Z: g g > ha > z tp tp~ [noborn=QCD] ZFF^2==2 ZZHH<=0 TTHA^2==2

PROC: g g > ha > l- l+ tp tp~ [noborn=QCD] ZSS^2==1 ZFF^2==1 ZZHH<=0 TTHA^2==2
ggF_TRIxBOX.NAME: gg_ztt_%s_ggF_trixbox
PROC_Z: g g > ha > z tp tp~ [noborn=QCD] ZSS^2==1 ZFF^2==1 ZZHH<=0 TTHA^2==2

PROC: b b~ > z ha > l- l+ tp tp~ ZSS^2==2 TTHA^2==2
bb_S.NAME: bb_ztt_%s_s
PROC_Z: b b~ > ha > z tp tp~ ZSS^2==2 TTHA^2==2

PROC: b b~ > z ha > l- l+ tp tp~ ZSS==0 ZZHH==0 TTHA^2==2 / hl
bb_T.NAME: bb_ztt_%s_t
PROC_Z: b b~ > ha > z tp tp~ ZSS==0 ZZHH==0 TTHA^2==2 / hl

PROC: b b~ > z ha > l- l+ tp tp~ ZSS^2==1 ZZHH^2==0 TTHA^2==2 / hl
bb_SxT.NAME: bb_ztt_%s_sxt
PROC_Z: b b~ > ha > z tp tp~ ZSS^2==1 ZZHH^2==0 TTHA^2==2 / hl

PROC: p p > z t t~ QED=99 QCD=99, z > l- l+
bkg_total.NAME: gg_ztt_bkg
PROC_Z: p p > z t t~ QED=99 QCD=99
